mod.name: Reset System
mod.author: Kimoszin
mod.talkaction: domodlib('reset_config') return doPlayerSendTextMessage(cid, MESSAGE_EVENT_ADVANCE, "You have "..getResets(cid).." resets.")
mod.movevent:
domodlib('reset_config') function onStepIn(cid, item, position, fromPosition) local minResets = 1
if (not(getResets(cid) >= minResets)) then doPlayerSendCancel(cid, "Sorry, you need "..minResets.." resets") return doTeleportThing(cid, fromPosition) end
doPlayerSendCancel(cid, "Welcome") end
mod.action:
domodlib('reset_config') function onUse(cid, item, position, fromPosition) local minResets = 4
if not(getResets(cid) >= minResets) then return doPlayerSendCancel(cid, "Desculpa,voce presisa de "..minResets.." resets") end
doPlayerSendCancel(cid, "Bem Vindo") end
